body: Can you submit a PR with this as a git hook?

Unfortunately no.
I do not know the proper way to set up git hooks that will apply to everyone.

Nak. Why are we being cranky about this? It's benign, and windows editors
really like to add it.
- Chris

On Wed, Aug 26, 2015 at 2:02 PM, Taryn Hill notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Unfortunately no.
> I do not know the proper way to set up git hooks that will apply to
> everyone.
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/9169#issuecomment-134790861.

You could update the .editorconfig for .cs files as a way to get those consistent without being as heavy handed.

Please don't force anything on .sln or .csproj - Visual Studio will just streamroll over those which would be a big pain for Windows users.
